name: The Experiment (itch) (olimobu)
description:
This is a experiment for Ludum Dare 35.

The Experiment (Ludum Dare)

I do not know code.
I do not know to draw.
I'm a musician who has made a game.
An unusual game.

You will love it or hate it.
But I don't care.
I've done alone!

@OrchestralBb

Simultaneously, I composed music for:

https://macro.itch.io/antivaxx
